Species Traits.name: Vian Moves Slowly
Species Traits.description: If a Wits test would be notably improved by faster problem solving, get an extra die type on your roll

Species Traits.name: Unrivaled Reaction
Species Traits.description: If a Grace check would be notably improved by a faster reaction time, get an extra die type on your roll

Species Traits.name: Clanspeak
Species Traits.description: You can call upon the aid of your Clan. The Clan may be able to offer food, shelter, or even (if it is a particularly pressing matter of Clan survival) combat assistance

Species Traits.name: Clanless
Species Traits.description: You may add one bonus die to any roll made to intimidate, due to the fearsome reputation of exiles (this only works if the intimidated knows you are a clanless Primas-ika)

Species Traits.name: By His Righteous Code
Species Traits.description: You are viewed favorably by combatants that might be likely to surrender, since they know they will find mercy

Species Traits.name: The Old Hunger
Species Traits.description: You must make a Spirit Roll when entering combat. On a failure, you get an extra die type for all fight rolls made, but must always choose to 'Go For the Kill'

Species Traits.name: Preservationist Power
Species Traits.description: Add +1 to all TNs for casting spells.

Species Traits.name: Survivalist Presence
Species Traits.description: Add one die to rolls made to negotiate.
